statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, description, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE description LIKE 'Salary%';
SELECT id, date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, description, amount FROM financial_data ORDER BY amount DESC, date ASC;
SELECT id, date, description, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE description LIKE '%salary%' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, description, amount FROM financial_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY date DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount <= 500 ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Budget;
SELECT category, amount FROM Budget WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Expense WHERE date = '2022-01-20';
SELECT category, amount FROM Budget ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT description FROM Budget WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT * FROM Budget WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY budget_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM Expense WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT budget_id, description, amount FROM Budget WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT category, amount FROM Expense WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT budget_id, amount, description FROM Budget WHERE description ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM FinancialData;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM BudgetCategories ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM BudgetCategories WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM TransactionTypes ORDER BY type_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, date, transaction_name FROM FinancialData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT transaction_name, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE date >= '2022-03-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT id, date, transaction_name, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE transaction_name LIKE 'Salary%' AND amount >= 2000
SELECT * FROM BudgetCategories JOIN TransactionTypes ON BudgetCategories.category_name = TransactionTypes.type_name ORDER BY BudgetCategories.budget_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM Budget;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM Budget WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, category FROM Budget WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT * FROM Expense ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, amount FROM Income WHERE source = 'Salary';
SELECT * FROM Budget;
SELECT category, amount FROM Expense WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT id, source, amount FROM Income ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS Total_Income FROM Income;
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE type = 'expense' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Budgets;
SELECT category, goal_amount FROM Budgets WHERE actual_amount > goal_amount;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM Transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT source, amount FROM Incomes WHERE amount >= 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM Expenses WHERE category='Groceries';
SELECT * FROM Budgets WHERE category='Groceries';

SELECT Transactions.date, Transactions.amount, Expenses.amount FROM Transactions JOIN Expenses ON Transactions.id = Expenses.transaction_id WHERE Expenses.category='Shopping' ORDER BY Transactions.date DESC;
SELECT Incomes.date, Incomes.amount, Incomes.source, Transactions.description FROM Incomes JOIN Transactions ON Incomes.transaction_id = Transactions.id WHERE Incomes.amount > 1000;
SELECT Accounts.name, Accounts.balance, Transactions.date FROM Accounts JOIN Transactions ON Accounts.id = Transactions.id WHERE Transactions.amount > 500 ORDER BY Accounts.balance DESC;
SELECT Budgets.category, SUM(Transactions.amount) AS total_spent FROM Budgets LEFT JOIN Transactions ON Budgets.id = Transactions.budget_id GROUP BY Budgets.category HAVING total_spent > 1000;
